Women Safety com.aasfencoders.womensafety
//main activity and its fragments related Loading User … Home Track Others Track Me Extras ANONYMOUS phone Signed in! Sign in canceled
//Home Fragment string resource Invite New Connection Show Received Connection Show Connection Welcome to Women Safety App Select Contact
//Invite Connection Page Invite Connection Page Fetching Connections those you have Invited … Sorry, No Connection are Invited Get Started By Adding a Connection by pressing on that plus button
//contacts fetch Loading Contacts … No Contact Selected No Phone Number Present Confirm Selection
//initial form FirstForm User Registration Enter Your Name Name shouldn\'t be blank UPLOAD Users Profile
//in general name number ERROR Some error occcured
//invite sent strings status invited sent sent received username Number invitation
//contact list string CONT:: Creating Connection Link … Permission Denied to Read Contacts. Please Grant it.
//receive list accept reject rejected
//Received Connection Page Received Connection Page Fetching if any Contacts sent you connection … Sorry, No Pending Received Connection Connections will show here once they send you an invitation.
//Matched Connection Page matched Fetching Matched Contacts … Matched Connection Page Sorry, No Connection are Matched Get Started By Adding a Connection by navigating to the Add Connection Page
zero one two EMPTY Map
You can rest now.\nNo connection is in danger. Here only those connection will display who are in danger at the current moment. For past location of your matched contacts, refer to Show Connection section.
//FCM latitude longitude phone stamp
//connectivity No Internet Connectivity reload Data Loading From Server Connect to Mobile Network/Wi-Fi and then try again
//sms Select your preferred SIM Select your contacts default Country code It will be used to sent automated SMS. Data rates will apply, SIM +91 ISONUMBER SIM 1 SIM 2 SIMSET YES NO Don\'t send automated SMS alert
Get Location Map results name geometry location
lat lng vicinity You haven\'t received any tracking info from this user.
reminder ShaniPeeth Notification
NAVITEM 0 1
OnBoarding done
ISOPOSE Police Station(s) found in the surrounding area!! NEARBY POLICE STATIONS Fetching Nearby Police Station
User\'s current location address can not be parsed!! USER\'s CURRENT LOCATION USER\'s LAST LOCATION Approximate location of the User Want to play the police siren sound? Send photos of suspicious activity / location when GPS not working
Enable Location Permission to continue Enable GPS permission to continue
Want to see Police Stations that can be reached from your current location? Click the button SETTINGS SHARE Play Police Siren Send Photos to Friends
